title: Value Co-Creation Strategies Through Enhanced Online Learning Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning tool usage and digital communication experience
context.additional_context: Requires content design optimized for smartphone-based mobile learning environments, emphasizing practical applicability for professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply at least three behavioral and social engagement strategies in online learning environments.
Learners can design practical methods to manage cognitive and emotional engagement factors, reducing demotivation factors by 20%.
Learners can plan value co-creation activities with peer learners using mobile-based collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
